name: Fade to Black
description:
Fade to Black is an action-shooter game developed by Delphine Software International and Delphine. It was originally released in 1995. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Fade to Black is available on PlayStation and PC.
Matt Wolf produced the game. It was directed by Paul Cuisset. It was scored by Raphaël Gesqua.
